Welcome.greeting:
You have entered the world of Tantamount.
This world is lush and populated with all forms of life, however only two species dominate the land.
The Indaras and the Mazeins are eternallly at odds with eachother, yet neither is prey nor hunter to the other.
One spends much of their time in bodies of water while the other calls the treetops their home.
As both empires expand into the Age of Awareness their ecosystems are increasingly overlapping. 
Leaders on both sides feel a war brewing.
Welcome.name: What will you call your character?
Welcome.character:
You have come here to embody an individual from one of the two species.
It is up to you prevent calamity and seek understanding. Will you journey as an Indara or Mazei?

Warnings.challenge_one: You did not aquire enough gems to proceed. You will be sent back to the beginning of challenge one

task_one.message:
🌄 💎  Raska, your tribe leader, has commanded you to seek out and return an ancient relic to its proper place. 
This relic was lost to your people thousands of years ago, he explains. 
Raska implies you will be reimbursed for your tribal duty. 
Do you name your price?

task_two.message:
👝 You will meet Larna tomorrow morning as she is an expert on the ancient Relic. 
Until then you will need to prepare for your journery.
You pack the normal essentials, some dehydrated food, and a wireless comm. 
You only have room for one more item. 
Do you decide to take your compact yet deadly 'Flinger' or a tribal 'Token' for good luck?

actions.accept:
You casually request 4 gems. Raska smirks quickly. He is reaffirmed in his decision 
as you are strong ambitious member of the tribe. He tosses you a bag of 5 gems and departs.
actions.decline: You decline politely. Raska flicks his tongue in annoyance. He throws 3 gems your way and dismisses you and hopes that you will succeed

task_one.message:
🌄 💎  Your pack leader Denala, has called you into her nest to speak privately. 
She honors you by permitting you leave from the pack in order to locate a beautiful recently discovered artifact. 
This mysterious artifact will bring prosperity to your people and will ensure their future place in the world. 
Denala customarily offers you gems for your sacrifice. Do you accept payment?

task_two.message:
👝 You must pack quickly as next glider out of the forest leaves first thing in the morning.
 You pack the normal essentials, some dehydrated food, and a wireless comm. 
You only have room for one more item in your pack. Do you bring a volatile but effective weapon a 'Gaser' 
or a 'Scroll' that can be manipulated to display any reference book from your Pack's library.

actions.accept: You eagerly accept, but notice a look of annoyance on Denala's face as she promptly hands over 3 gems and dismisses you from her quarters
actions.decline:
You politely decline, professing that bringing honor to your people is the only payment you need.
Denala bows and and then smiles while offering up 5 gems. You graciously accept.
